name: Russian Anarchy
description:
You have been sent to a field hospital as a russian army officer to care russians against a new unknwon virus. The russian government give you the white card to maintain order in infected regions and to care the most possible people, but to achieve that, you will must make difficult choices.

The game was a first year student project : 

Henno Théo : Game Producer, Programmer, Game Artist, Level Designer, Game Designer.

Twitter : https://twitter.com/NazioLt

ArtStation : https://www.artstation.com/nazio_lt

Itch.io : https://nazio-lt.itch.io/

Robert Nathan : Narrative Designer, Game Designer

Rochette Lucas : Game Artist

Sanchez Hugo : Game Artist

Menetret Zoé : Game Artist

A great thanks to Normand Julien for the OST.
